topic.title: Newborns Vital Signs Section - conformance rules

lines.i: The vital signs - newborn section contains measurement results of the newborn's vital signs. The reader should note that the subject of this section - the newborn infant - is different from the overall subject of the clinical document - which is the mother.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.11"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:356)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:355)/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:354)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:357)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Newborns Vital Signs Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.46)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:356)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:355)/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:354)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:357)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Newborns Vital Signs Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.46)

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="962301552"/> <code code="1854725470"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <text/> <entry> <observation> <id root="MDHT" extension="1482021203"/> <code code="1108617296"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entry> </section>
